snippet: A former soldier was sentenced late Monday to 6060 years in prison for his role in the 1982 massacre of 201 Mayan peasants in the village of Dos Erres during Guatemala’s civil war.
lead_paragraph: A former soldier was sentenced late Monday to 6060 years in prison for his role in the 1982 massacre of 201 Mayan peasants in the village of Dos Erres during Guatemala’s civil war.

headline.main: Guatemala: Ex-soldier Sentenced to 6060 Years for 1982 Massacre

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
